insert into tbl_device_file (device_file_id,file_name, version, file_url, request_file_url, label, signature, crc, create_time, modify_time, create_user_id, modify_user_id, del_flag, eType) values
(#{deviceFileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.requestFileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.crc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.eType, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update tbl_device_file
file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
request_file_url = #{requestFileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
signature = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
crc = #{crc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
eType = #{eType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where device_file_id = #{deviceFileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
delete from tbl_device_file where device_file_id in
#{item}
mapper.select:
select
from tbl_device_file
and hw_version like concat('%', #{deviceFileModule.hWVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'%')
and hw_version is null
and (eType = #{deviceFileModule.eType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} or eType is null)
and eType = #{deviceFileModule.eType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and del_flag = 0
order by create_time desc
mapper.update:
update tbl_device_file
file_name = #{uploadFileModule.fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{uploadFileModule.version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hw_version = #{uploadFileModule.hWVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
label = #{uploadFileModule.label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
signature = #{uploadFileModule.signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{uploadFileModule.delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
eType = #{uploadFileModule.eType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where device_file_id = #{uploadFileModule.deviceFileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select distinct hw_version from tbl_device_file where eType = #{eType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and del_flag = 0
